ingredients.content: 1 - 1 ½ tsp ground cumin, to taste
2 - 3 tsp chicken stock paste, to taste

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then remove 1 heaped tsp chopped parsley and set aside.
Add onions in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add sunflower oil, ground cumin and ground turmeric then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add water, chicken stock paste and red lentils, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on mixing bowl lid then cook <b>20-25 min/98°C//speed 1.5<b>. Transfer to soup bowls, garnish with reserved chopped parsley and serve immediately.
